Description: Pottery ostracon with text containing a letter from Anatolios and Isak concerning money.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.89, pl.64)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82745) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82745)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 64:1 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
